Function init_nc_parameters¶

  • Defined in File program_io.h

Function Documentation¶

void init_nc_parameters(nc_parameters_t &nc, uint32_t n = 32, uint32_t n_timesteps = 7922)¶

Initialize the nc parameters to default values. and allocate memory.

Parameters

  • nc: The struct where the parameters are initialized.

  • n: The number of trajectories in the netCDF file.

  • n_timesteps: The maximum number of timesteps in the netCDF file.
